Keywords: Robot , Sentinel
Real Name: Various
Special Powers
SENTINEL SQUAD DEPLOYMENT: Each additional XMRF #LG002 Sentinel added to your starting force (beyond the first) costs 25 points. (You may choose a different starting line for each.)
CAPTURE PROTOCOL INITIATED: Plasticity, but affects all opposing characters within 3 squares and line of fire.
ALL POWER TO SCANNERS: Incapacitate, 2 targets, [Improved Targeting: Hindering].

July 20, 2021
Dortmuner
Honestly, if I’m using multiple generics, I usually just use one card for all of them. I don’t know if that’s allowed in official events. (I’m guessing not.) This one has multiple starting lines, so there’s a little difference there, but if I pull one Legacy card with these, I’m not going to try to track down two more for additional clix. Maybe it won’t be quite the feeding frenzy to get one. The clix were already pricey enough before they became modern legal again.
July 20, 2021
Organous
Hardly. These sentinels were just 2 sets prior, in the Dark Phoenix Saga. Rather surprising they'd do a legacy card for something so recent. This does make them somewhat better, but legacy cards are relatively rare. 1 per brick, if I understand correctly. For cheap generics like this, that's going to make them rather high-demand, so the value's going to be quite considerable.
